alert.note: Alert for Big Island Interior (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 07 at 3:15AM HST until August 09 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR LEEWARD AREAS DUE TO GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY... .Very dry fuels combined with strong and gusty easterly winds and low humidities below 45 percent will produce critical fire weather conditions through Tuesday night. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY FOR ... The National Weather Service in Honolulu has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect through 6 AM HST Wednesday. * AFFECTED AREA...Big Island interior. * WIND...East winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 mph. * HUMIDITY...20 to 30 percent during afternoons and evenings. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior. A Red Flag Warning does not predict new fire starts.
